title: Lenovo ThinkPad X13s: Release date, price, and everything you need to know
content:
Lenovo recently announced the ThinkPad X13s, the first ThinkPad ever to feature a Qualcomm Snapdragon processor. Indeed, while Qualcomm has been making chips for PCs for a few years now, they haven’t truly caught on. The initial release of the Snapdragon 8cx Gen 1 was quite good, but only a handful of devices used it,

The post Lenovo ThinkPad X13s: Release date, price, and everything you need to know appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Lenovo's ThinkPad X13s is the first ThinkPad with a Qualcomm chipset, and it looks very promising. Here's everything we know so far.
